xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 15 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 04:58 <misko__> has joined #medsavant 06:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 06:49 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 08:10 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:11 <bvancea> hello everyone 08:12 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 08:29 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 08:29 <bvancea> what's up? 08:30 <sdumitriu> Not much 08:30 <bvancea> I've moved from the dorms at the end of last week and had some trouble setting up the internet 08:30 <bvancea> did you get my email on friday? 08:30 <sdumitriu> Yes 08:31 <bvancea> well, I've pushed some commits earlier 08:32 <bvancea> I've done some refactoring to the translator code, since I realized it was quite hard to deal with groups of logical operators on the where clause 08:32 <bvancea> works quite nice now :) 08:32 <sdumitriu> Good 08:32 <sdumitriu> I'll take a look later 08:33 <bvancea> sure 08:33 <bvancea> I'm wondering wether to include moving what I've done to smaller modules in this week's goals 08:34 <bvancea> since Marc wanted to have a discussion first 08:34 <bvancea> do we have a date set for the hangout? 08:34 <sdumitriu> Not yet 08:34 <sdumitriu> You can send another doodle 08:35 <bvancea> okay, I'll set that up 08:47 <bvancea> participation link for the poll: http://doodle.com/uehszm97qien45pp 08:47 <bvancea> I've also sent some invites 09:38 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:47 <BogdanVancea1> has joined #medsavant 15:51 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 16:17 <sdumitriu1> Hey mcupak 16:17 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 16:19 <mcupak> hey sdumitriu1 16:19 <mcupak> not bad, how are you? 16:19 <sdumitriu1> Oh so busy... 16:19 <mcupak> work on the release? 16:20 <sdumitriu1> A couple of releases actually 16:20 <mcupak> is medsavant distributed in several bundles? 16:21 <sdumitriu1> WDYM? 16:23 <mcupak> well you mentioned several releases...so I was wondering if they are all for medsavant...if there different "versions" 16:23 <sdumitriu1> No, the other one is for PhenoTips 16:23 <mcupak> ah i see 16:31 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 18:57 <misko___> has joined #medsavant 19:50 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 22:07 <sdumitriu> http://www.youtube.com/watch?annotation_id=annotation_441170&feature=iv&src_vid=sJT_vfVjS7I&v=F4zX--5Ils8
